hero.slide1_subheading: The best local products delivered to your door.
hero.slide2_subheading: Discover our weekly discounts on hundreds of products.
hero.slide3_subheading: A modern shopping experience designed for you.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: A passion for quality, a commitment to service.
about.p1: At Tlemcen Smart Supermarket, our mission is to revolutionize the way our beloved city shops for groceries. We combine the convenience of modern technology with the warmth of local service.
about.p2: Founded by a team of tech and food enthusiasts, we aim to bring high-quality products, sourced locally whenever possible, directly to your doorstep.
about.p3: We believe in supporting local farmers and producers, and in offering our customers a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience. Thank you for being a part of our journey.

contact.subtitle: Have a question or a suggestion? We'd love to hear from you.

loyalty.description: Overview of the loyalty program settings.
loyalty.explanation: Customers earn 1 loyalty point for every 100 DZD spent. These points can be used for future discounts.
loyalty.user_view_desc: Users can see their points balance on their profile page.
loyalty.admin_view_desc: Admins can see each user's points on the users page.

settings.settings_updated_desc: Your site settings have been saved successfully.

legal.p1_text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, place an order, or contact customer support.
legal.p2_l1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services.
legal.p2_l2: Process your transactions and send you related information.
legal.p2_l3: Communicate with you about products, services, offers, and events.
legal.p3_text: We may share your information with vendors, consultants, and other service providers who need access to such information to carry out work on our behalf.
legal.p4_text: We take reasonable measures to help protect your information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.
legal.p5_text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy.
legal.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
legal.t1_text: By accessing or using our application, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
legal.t2_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
legal.t3_text: You agree to pay all fees or charges to your account in accordance with the fees, charges, and billing terms in effect at the time a fee or charge is due and payable.
legal.t4_text: We may terminate or suspend your access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
legal.t5_text: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Algeria, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
